title: The Green Promise (1949 Drama) Directed by William D. Russell | Starring Natalie Wood

sources.title: The Green Promise (1949 Drama) Directed by William D. Russell | Starring Natalie Wood
sources.description:
Stubborn farmer Mr. Matthews (Walter Brennan) clashes with his daughter Deborah (Marguerite Chapman) over modernizing the farm. But he clings to to time-tested traditional techniques in their Depression-era farm. He begins to alienate his children, who are growing up whether he likes it or not. As the family battles Mother Natureâ€™s wrath, youngest Susan (Natalie Wood) defies his iron grip to rescue her beloved lambs. The Matthews' must unite old roots and new shoots before the tempest drowns their future.

Original title: The Green Promise 

Colorized version: https://youtu.be/JXi9hBCgqQo

Director: William D. Russell
Writer: Monte Collins
Actors: Marguerite Chapman, Walter Brennan, Robert Paige, Natalie Wood
